column1: '''Lissuin''' was a fragrant flower of [[Tol Eressëa]], and was said to bring the heart ease.  It was one of the types of flowers brought by a ship of the [[Eldar]] to [[Númenor]] to grace the wedding of [[Tar-Aldarion
The name is related to the [[Quenya]] word ''[[lissë]]'' meaning "sweet".<ref>{{RGEO
